title: Assign Event/Assign Session
introduction: This guide will show you how to quickly and easily enroll staff in live instructor-led training sessions. Managers can enroll their team members, while administrators have broader options depending on their permissions. In Cornerstone, an Event is like a course template—for example, BLS Renewal Course. A Session is a specific instance of that course, like BLS Renewal Course on January 15 at 3 p.m.

Managers can enroll their team members, while administrators have broader options depending on their permissions. In Cornerstone, an Event is like a course template—for example, BLS Renewal Course. A Session is a specific instance of that course, like BLS Renewal Course on January 15 at 3 p.m.

steps.title: Search for an Event
steps.details:
1. Under the Learning dropdown, select Assign Training.
  2. The Learning Search Page will open.
  3. Simply enter a key word or the name of the course. Top results will populate in the dropdown.
  4. Press Enter to view all search results.
  5. You can use the filter options to narrow your search results.

hotspots.title: Learning Search Page
hotspots.description: To navigate to the Learning Search page first go to Assign Training

hotspots.title: Global Search Icon
hotspots.description: Search for events here using the full title or keywords

steps.title: Select an event
steps.details:
1. Click on the event title to access the Event Details.
  2. Click Show More to view additional course details.

steps.title: Select a session
steps.details:
There are two ways to enroll a learner in a session: (1)  allow them to choose their own session by assigning the overall event, or (2) enroll them directly in a scheduled session.

To assign a learner an event:

  1. Click the Assign button for the event.
  2. When you assign the event, the learner receives a task on their transcript prompting them to enroll in a session that works for their schedule.

Assigning the session follows the same steps as assigning the event.

 

To assign a learner to a specific session: 

  1. Click the 'Select a Session' button, or scroll down .
  2. To see all available sessions, click 'Show More.'
  3. Once you find the right session, Click the black 'View Details' button.
  4. Review the session details to confirm it’s correct and that a seat is available.
  5. Finally, click the white 'Assign' button.

hotspots.title: Available Seats
hotspots.description: Review the available remaining open seats.

steps.title: Select learners to assign
steps.details:
To select a learner:

  1. Find their name and click the checkbox next to it.
  2. Checking the box adds the learner to the selected list.
  3. Continue searching for more learners and clicking the checkbox next to their names.
  4. Toggle "Show Selected" to review the full list of selected learners.
  5. Once you have your complete list of names, scroll down and click the blue "Continue to Details" button.

hotspots.title: Show Selected
hotspots.description: Toggle this feature to review the selected learners.

steps.title: Confirm the assignment
steps.details:
1. Click the checkbox next to "Automatically Register Users" to add them to the class roster.
  2. Some events may require manager approval before learners are registered in the session.
  3. Once ready, click the Submit button.
  4. Cornerstone will navigate you back to the Event Details page.
  5. Notice the green checkmark in the bottom left will fly in with a confirmation that the assignment was made.

hotspots.title: Add to Class Roster
hotspots.description: Click the check box to add users to the class roster

tips: If the learner is assigned an Event will appear on the learner’s homepage under "Assigned Training." From there, they will select a session that fits their schedule.
If the learner is assigned a Session will appear under the learner's "Upcoming Enrolled Sessions."
To confirm the assignment, you can always review a learner's transcript.
